resources.string:
To Make a Record:
 Step 1: Select the Plus button in the bottom right corner of the screen OR select the Menu button in the top left corner of the screen and then select Create in the menu that appears
 Step 2: Fill out the Team Name and Team Number fields
 Step 3: Fill out the Game Number field
 Step 4: Fill out the Autonomous section for the Autonomous section of the FTC game
 Step 5: Fill out the TeleOp section for the Driver Controlled/TeleOp section of the FTC game
 Step 6: Fill out the End Game section for the End Game section of the FTC game
 Step 7: Optionally, fill out the Comment section with minor details about the FTC game
 Step 8: Select the Check button which appears in the top right corner of the screen
 

 To View a Record:
 Step 1: To get to the Record Viewer, select the Menu button in the top left corner of the screen and then select View in the menu that appears
 Step 2: Select the record which you wish to view, you may use the Search function in the top right corner of the Record Viewer to find the record you wish to view
 

 To Edit a Record:
 Step 1: Go to the Record Viewer
 Step 2: Select the record which you wish to edit, you may use the Search function in the top right corner of the Record Viewer to find the record you wish to edit
 Step 3: Press the Edit tool in the top right corner
 Step 4: Once you are done editing, you may press the Check button in the top right corner of the screen, this will return you to the Record Viewer
 

 To Delete a Record:
 Step 1: Go to the Record Viewer
 Step 2: Select the record which you wish to delete, you may use the Search function in the top right corner of the Record Viewer to find the record you wish to delete
 Step 3: Press the Delete button in the top right corner next to the Edit tool
 

 To Select a Color for which team you are judging:
 Step 1: Select the Menu button in the top right corner of the screen
 Step 2: Select the color under Selector in the menu that appears
 

 To Export a Record:
 Step 1: Select the Menu button in the top right corner of the screen
 Step 2: Select the Export tool in the Menu that appears
 Step 3: Select Yes on the pop-up that appears to allow storage of the exported file in your device (this pop-up will only appear once)
 Step 4: Follow the path displayed to find the exported file which can then be transferred anywhere
